title: FS: Lower Grade T205 Lot w/Matty & other HOF's  **SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lower Grade T205 Lot w/Matty & other HOF's  **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following 20 card T205 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, most of the cards are lower grade although there are a few solid mid-grade cards in the bunch.  Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve the lot.

Asking $375 delivered on the lot.  **LOT HAS BEEN SOLD**  Thanks to all who were interested.

cards pictured:

Bates
Bergen
Bridwell
CHANCE (HOF)
CLARKE (HOF)
Delahanty

Doyle (slight trim or miscut on bottom)
